24dce32c-0b1c-446c-81e6-08dca635de29.name: 战斗反射
24dce32c-0b1c-446c-81e6-08dca635de29.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

6995b929-2775-4561-a3df-4da7953b66f8.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

17ebae53-2847-4664-ae4b-f3a3af577cd8.name: 健康
17ebae53-2847-4664-ae4b-f3a3af577cd8.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

40142d3e-d436-4bb1-99e1-be6b7d3d2a69.name: Fit, Very
40142d3e-d436-4bb1-99e1-be6b7d3d2a69.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

1bc1a1fd-43d9-44b9-a9f1-0bc03f935b7b.name: 幸运
1bc1a1fd-43d9-44b9-a9f1-0bc03f935b7b.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

b102020f-edce-4475-8ac2-228ab8000c21.name: Luck, Extraordinary
b102020f-edce-4475-8ac2-228ab8000c21.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

3e6c1a4a-ba9c-4a9a-8620-b091f51ec0dd.name: 标志性装备
3e6c1a4a-ba9c-4a9a-8620-b091f51ec0dd.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

893ed2ba-3d45-4d82-9923-a0c9cfd46f34.name: Weapon Bond
893ed2ba-3d45-4d82-9923-a0c9cfd46f34.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

ff7b9ad4-cc44-4794-acc8-66670b8d0928.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

5abdcad2-fcb7-41f9-b66b-2045e478b2f9.name: 执念
5abdcad2-fcb7-41f9-b66b-2045e478b2f9.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

c57f1477-1390-4931-9d14-d85aba137962.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

2a825d8e-24b2-4373-b4c5-f6b53aa41753.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
